programme.desc: Viva Mort - When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D'Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep13
programme.desc: End of the Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Skeleton Town - The townspeople are so terrified when Puss brings the skeleton army back to San Lorenzo that they ignore Uli's sad attempts at being evil and scary.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Familiar Feeling - When Puss discovers the coveted Crown of Souls gemstone was split into three pieces for three witch sisters, he finds Malviola and asks for her stone

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Please Hold for the Next Representative - Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they've solved one issue, another springs up - and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits' end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Please Hold While We Connect You - In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone - but it's the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi's rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep10
programme.desc: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back - When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Magical Japanese S1 Ep2092
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode looks at words related to the number seven. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan S1 Ep6126
programme.desc: Onomichi Betcha is a three-day festival in Hiroshima Prefecture. Masked ogres carry sticks with which to "torment" spectators. But being hit or poked with a stick is said to bring good luck.

programme.title: BOSAI S1 Ep2090
programme.desc: In Japan, extremely powerful lightning known as a superbolt can occur in the Hokuriku region during winter. What is the source of this power, which is comparable to a small nuclear explosion?

programme.desc: Tagawa Kinya (Design engineer)investigates the process of design by looking at the work of Yanagi Sori, who shaped products by making models using different materials.

programme.desc: Onomichi Betcha is a three-day festival in Hiroshima Prefecture. Masked ogres carry sticks with which to "torment" spectators. But being hit or poked with a stick is said to bring good luck.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: The Long Path to Gender Equality S1 Ep4001
programme.desc: Forty years ago, Akamatsu Ryoko, a visionary woman advocated for the passage of Japan's Equal Employment Opportunity Act. Now, a new generation continues the fight for gender equality.

programme.title: DOSUKOI Sumo Salon S1 Ep5001
programme.desc: This time we break down "kimedashi," a power move where a rikishi locks their opponent's arms and marches them out of the ring. We analyze technique, style, and the risks of the maneuver.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.desc: Join May J. for music from Chameleon Lime Whoopiepie (getting international attention for their free-spirited style) and vocalist Suzuhana Yuko, who fuses rock with traditional Japanese instruments.

programme.title: Little Charo S1 Ep6116
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-14.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini S1 Ep6032
programme.desc: Konnyaku is an important element of Japanese cuisine. It offers various health benefits and is drawing international attention. We learn about the many uses of this surprising superfood.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan S1 Ep6045
programme.desc: A cat patrols the rice fields, but there's always time for a mid-day nap. At a vineyard, we get a tour from a cat named Pinot Noir! He's popular with visitors but always plays it cool.

programme.desc: We explore Osaka, a prefecture known for its great cuisine. We meet a couple who fish for daggertooth pike conger (hamo), which taste great in summer, a farmer growing juicy eggplants, and much more.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini S1 Ep6024

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work S1 Ep2078

programme.title: Zero Waste Life S1 Ep2093
programme.desc: Culinary researcher Yokoyama Takako lives in a mountain region. She cans and ferments local produce to make it through the depths of winter, work supported by nature's bounty and ancestral wisdom.

programme.desc: After a historic 2024 that saw him defend his UFC light heavyweight title three times with three knockouts, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev. Plus former interim lightweight champion Justin Gaithje battles Rafael Fiziev for the second time, and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva

Plus former interim lightweight champion Justin Gaithje battles Rafael Fiziev for the second time, and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1101Bestof2023

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC315MuhammadvsDellaMaddalena

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva
